name: Ghostfolio
description: Ghostfolio 是一个使用 Web 技术构建的开源财富管理软件。该应用程序帮助忙碌的人们跟踪股票、ETF 或加密货币，并做出可靠的、数据驱动的投资决策。

notes.text: Create your first user account by visiting the web interface and clicking 'Get Started'. The first user will automatically get admin privileges.
Optional: CoinGecko API keys can be added during installation or later in the .env file for enhanced cryptocurrency data.
Build process requires 4GB RAM (runtime: ~2GB). A temporary swap file will be created automatically if insufficient memory is detected.
